Name: Wagon Wheel
Ingredients: 45 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
FINE STRAIN into chilled glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: This classic cocktail will be best appreciated by lovers of Southern Comfort.
History: Adapted from a recipe purloined from David Embury's 'Fine Art of Mixing Drinks'.
Nutrition: One serving of Wagon Wheel contains 238 calories
